name: WP Payhip Integration
author: Robin Phillips (Author Help)

sections.description:
Integrates Payhip into WordPress. When a Payhip product page link is clicked, it will open a Payhip “Buy” box.

To use, just install and activate the plugin. There are no settings, it will automatically work on all links to Payhip product pages, both existing and new ones.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin zip file using WordPress’ plugin installer, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly (search for ‘WP Payhip Integration Robin Phillips’)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Any Payhip product page links will now open the Payhip “Buy Now” box
sections.changelog:
v1.1

  • Improved detection of Payhip product links

v1.0

  • Initial release
